meanings.definition: The act of giving a gift that one has received to someone else.
meanings.sent1: Regifting is when you pass on a present you got to someone else.
meanings.sent2: I heard regifting is common during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: She found out about the regifting of her old sweater and laughed it off.
meanings.sent4: The regifting of kindness can bring joy to many people.
meanings.sent5: The concept of regifting can save money and reduce waste.

meanings.definition: To give a gift that one has received to someone else.
meanings.sent1: I am regifting this book to my friend because I already read it.
meanings.sent2: She decided to regift the scarf she received last Christmas.
meanings.sent3: He regifted the ugly vase to his neighbor, hoping they would like it.
meanings.sent4: Regifting the love and care you receive can make the world a better place.
meanings.sent5: Regifting items can be a thoughtful way to share joy with others.
